counterfactuals.name: relation_fallback_enforced
counterfactuals.change: Force deterministic relation fallback when relation intent confidence drops below threshold.

counterfactuals.name: citation_retention_guard
counterfactuals.change: Apply final-stage guard that ensures at least one valid source citation line persists.

counterfactuals.name: mode_router_hardening
counterfactuals.change: Strengthen report-mode router for repo_technical and ambiguous_general families.
